base_description: Cylindrical pen, blue body, black ends.
part_description: The pen has two main parts: a blue cylindrical body and black caps on each end. The body is long and narrow, with the caps being shorter and rounded.
internal_interaction_description: The black caps are designed to fit snugly onto the ends of the blue cylindrical body, likely serving as protective covers. The internal mechanism, not visible, would typically involve an ink reservoir and a nib for writing.
external_interaction_description: The pen interacts with paper or other writing surfaces through its nib, transferring ink to create marks. It is handheld, designed for ease of use and portability, fitting comfortably in a pocket or bag.
